name: Network Endpoint
description: The network endpoint object describes source or destination of a network connection.

hostname.description: The hostname of the network endpoint.

ip.description: The IP address of the network endpoint.

location.description: The geographical location of the network endpoint.

mac.description: The MAC address of the network endpoint.

svc_name.description: The service name, in service-to-service connections. For example, AWS VPC logs the pkt-src-aws-service and pkt-dst-aws-service fields identify the connection is coming from or going to an AWS service.
svc_name.name: Service Name

uid.description: The unique identifier of the network endpoint.
